Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
This class reads as input what arrives from the client and calls the different managers to perform the actions on the model, it can also return messages to be sent to the clients to the various client handlers. Based on "Strategy Pattern"
